properties.entry: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.CATEGORY_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_WRITER, M.MEMBER_NAME, B.COUNT, B.CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, CATEGORY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 1, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.CATEGORY_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_WRITER, M.MEMBER_NAME, B.COUNT, B.CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = ?
